summary.span: 表示一个长方形的小弹出窗口，该窗口在用户将指针悬停在一个控件上时显示有关该控件用途的简短说明。

span.span: Represents a small rectangular pop-up window that displays a brief description of a control's purpose when the user rests the pointer on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类，您可以提供提示用户时用户将指针放在控件上。With the class, you can provide hints to a user when the user places the pointer on a control. 警告用户控件的用途通常使用类。The class is typically used to alert users to the intended use of a control. 例如，可以指定工具提示文本接受名称，指定要在控件中键入的名称的格式的控件。For example, you can specify ToolTip text for a control that accepts a name, specifying the format of the name to be typed into the control. 除了提供提示，还可以使用类，以提供运行的时的状态信息。In addition to providing hints, you can also use the class to provide run time status information. 例如，可以使用类，以显示连接速度和质量的数据，当用户将指针拖到显示 Internet 连接状态的控件。For example, you can use the class to display connection speed and line quality data when the user moves the pointer onto a control that displays Internet connection status. 类可用于在任何容器中。The class can be used in any container. 若要显式指定一个容器，请使用构造函数。To explicitly specify a container, use the constructor. 单个组件通常用于为单个窗体上的多个控件创建工具提示。A single component typically is used to create ToolTips for multiple controls on a single form. 在创建后，使用单独调用方法将关联到单个控件的工具提示的显示文本。After you create a , use a separate call to the method to associate ToolTip display text to an individual control. 当用户将指针在控件上，则显示其文本的工具提示。Then when the user moves the pointer on a control, the ToolTip with its text is displayed. 您可以调用超过一次针对相同的控件来更改与控件关联的文本。You can call more than once for the same control to change the text that is associated with the control. 若要获取与控件关联的文本，请使用方法。To get the text that is associated with a control, use the method. 若要删除的实例的所有工具提示文本关联类中，使用方法。To remove all ToolTip text associations with an instance of the class, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 已禁用的控件不会显示工具提示文本。ToolTip text is not displayed for controls that are disabled. 除非属性设置为`true`，其容器处于非活动状态时，不显示工具提示。Unless the property is set to `true`, ToolTips are not displayed when their container is inactive. 类提供了下列属性和方法可修改默认行为和外观的工具提示。The class provides the following properties and methods to modify the default behavior and appearance of a ToolTip. |类别Category|相关联的成员Associated members| |--------------|------------------------| |手动显示Manual display|, , , , , , , , , , | |工具提示计时ToolTip timing|, , , , , , , , | |内容Content|, , , , , , , , , , | |外观Appearance|, , , , , , , , , , | 如果你想要禁用所有工具提示文本，以便它不能显示在你的应用程序，则可以使用属性。If you want to disable all ToolTip text so that it cannot be displayed in your application, you can use the property. 通常由操作系统，但若要自定义外观的绘制工具提示，可以设置属性设置为`true`并处理事件。Usually the ToolTip is drawn by the operating system, but to customize the appearance of the , you can set the property to `true` and handle the event. 类实现接口，只有一个方法， 。The class implements the interface, which has a single method, . 工具提示在设计时，扩展控件相同的窗体上添加`ToolTip`属性。ToolTips extend controls on the same form at design time, adding a `ToolTip` property. 有关扩展程序提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[扩展程序提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ce043d8-cd48-49dd-abef-185a2079e96a)。For more information about extender providers, see [Extender Providers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ce043d8-cd48-49dd-abef-185a2079e96a). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类，并将与该实例关联实例中创建的。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 然后代码将初始化延迟属性， ，和。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外的实例类集属性设置为`true`以启用要始终是无论是否在窗体处于活动状态时显示工具提示文本。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to always be display regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件相关联和一个。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 该代码示例需要在示例中定义的方法是否位于，其中包含控件命名为`button1`和一个控件命名为`checkBox1`，并从构造函数中调用该方法。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数，可将相关联任何对象。The constructor enables you to associate a with any object. 通过将相关联这种方式，您的工具提示的生存期的控制权移交。By associating the in this manner, you hand over control of the lifetime of the ToolTip to the . 如果你在应用程序中使用多个组件，并想要同时释放所有这些，这很有用。This can be useful if you use several components in your application, and want to dispose of all of them at the same time. 例如，如果您将相关联、 一个，和一个与，则调用上也会强制所有这些组件可供使用。For example, if you associate a , an , and a with a , calling on the will also force disposal of all of these components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与属性，可以启用或禁用此特定的指定文本的所有控件的工具提示文本显示组件。With the property, you can enable or disable the display of ToolTip text for all controls that have text specified by this particular component. 尽管多个组件可创建和分配给窗体中，设置属性设置为`false`仅影响当前。Although more than one component can be created and assigned to a form, setting the property to `false` only affects the current . 可以让用户在窗体提供应用程序的选项中设置此属性的值。You can enable users to set the value of this property in a form that provides application options. 这些选项，反过来，为用户提供启用或禁用工具提示显示在应用程序中的功能。These options, in turn, provide the user with the ability to enable or disable the display of ToolTips in your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，可缩短或延长时间的指针位于控件上时显示窗口。The property enables you to shorten or lengthen the time that the window is displayed when the pointer is on a control. 例如，如果在工具提示窗口中显示详细的帮助帮助，可以增加此属性以确保用户具有足够的时间来阅读的文本的值。For example, if you display extensive Help in a ToolTip window, you can increase the value of this property to ensure that the user has sufficient time to read the text. 如果你想要具有工具提示窗口的一致延迟模式，则可以设置属性。If you want to have a consistent delay pattern for your ToolTip windows, you can set the property. 属性集， ，和单一值基础为初始值的属性。The property sets the , , and properties to initial values based on a single value. 每次设置属性，则属性设置为 10 次属性值。Every time the property is set, the property is set to 10 times the property value. 一次属性设置，你可以单独设置重写默认值的属性。Once the property is set, you can independently set the property, overriding the default value. 您可以延迟一个弹出窗口的最长时间为 5000 毫秒。The maximum time you can delay a popup is 5000 milliseconds. 对于更长的持续时间，请使用方法可控制何时显示工具提示的确切时间。For longer durations, use the method to control the exact moment when the ToolTip is displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类，并将与该实例关联实例中创建的。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 然后代码将初始化延迟属性， ，和。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外的实例类集属性设置为`true`以便无论是否在窗体处于活动状态时显示工具提示文本。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to be displayed regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件相关联和一个。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 该代码示例需要在示例中定义的方法是否位于，其中包含控件命名为`button1`和一个控件命名为`checkBox1,`和从构造函数的调用该方法。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1,` and that the method is called from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks `pt`参数可以指定关联的控件、 其父窗体中或甚至是桌面的边界之外的位置。The `pt` parameter can specify a position outside the bounds of the associated control, its parent form, or even the desktop. 在关联控件的中心来放置工具提示。The ToolTip is positioned in the center of the associated control. 若要以模式方式显示工具提示，请调用改为重载版本的此方法。To display the ToolTip modally, call the overloaded version of this method instead. 在部分信任环境中运行的应用程序必须断言权限才能使用此方法，因为可以控制显示和独立于用户执行任何操作的工具提示的位置。Applications running in partial trust must assert the permission to use this method, as can control the display and location of a ToolTip independent of user action.

span.span: The parameter is .
is less than or equal to 0.
Requires permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与属性，可以显示工具提示窗口，即使的容器未处于活动状态。With the property, you can display a ToolTip window even when the container of the is not active. 可以在无模式窗口应用程序中使用此功能以启用要显示的工具提示窗口而不考虑的无模式窗口处于活动状态。You can use this feature in a modeless window application to enable ToolTip windows to be displayed regardless of which modeless window is active. 如果你想要通过使用创建的控件，此功能还非常有用，其中包含多个在其中显示工具提示窗口的控件。This feature is also useful when you want to create a control by using the , which contains a number of controls within it that display ToolTip windows. 因为通常不是活动窗口在窗体，此属性设置为上的`true`可使控件内的以在任何时候显示工具提示窗口。Because the is often not the active window on a form, setting this property to `true` enables the controls within the to display ToolTip windows at any time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类，并将与该实例关联实例中创建的。The following code example creates an instance of the class and associates the instance with the that the instance is created within. 然后代码将初始化延迟属性， ，和。The code then initializes the delay properties , , and . 此外的实例类集属性设置为`true`以便无论是否在窗体处于活动状态时显示工具提示文本。In addition the instance of the class sets the property to `true` to enable ToolTip text to be displayed regardless of whether the form is active. 最后，该示例将工具提示文本与窗体上的两个控件相关联和一个。Finally, the example associates ToolTip text with two controls on a form, a and a . 该代码示例需要在示例中定义的方法是否位于，其中包含控件命名为`button1`和一个控件命名为`checkBox1`，并从构造函数中调用该方法。The code example requires that the method defined in the example is located within a that contains a control named `button1` and a control named `checkBox1`, and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolTip Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolTip Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 停止用于隐藏所显示工具提示的计时器。

span.span: Stops the timer that hides displayed ToolTips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有内部计时器，使用它来设置工具提示显示持续时间。The class has an internal timer that it uses to set the display duration for ToolTips. 通过设置与此计时器相关联的持续时间属性。The duration associated with this timer is set through the property. 方法将停止此内部计时器，从而导致任何显示的工具提示，直到有模式地显示调用方法时，或最小化、 隐藏的或关闭了父窗体。The method will stop this internal timer, causing any displayed ToolTip to be shown modally until the method is called, or the parent form is minimized, hidden, or closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序通常用于多种用途，如菜单项和工具提示使用相同的字符串资源。An application commonly uses the same string resource for multiple purposes, such as a menu item and a ToolTip. 但是，菜单通常启用通过与符号字符，在菜单项字符串中指示的快捷键。However, menus often enable accelerators, denoted by an ampersand character, in the menu item string. 工具提示不支持此功能，因此默认情况下，与号只是显示为常规字符。ToolTips do not support this capability, so by default, ampersands are just displayed as normal characters. 设置属性设置为`true`从工具提示文本中删除所有与号。Setting the property to `true` removes all ampersands from the ToolTip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标题在窗口中显示为工具提示控件说明的标准文本上方的粗体文本行。The title is displayed within the window as a line of bold text above the standard text of a ToolTip control description. 通常情况下，标题是仅用于区分不同类别的控件在窗体上或作为较长控件说明的介绍。Typically, titles are only used either to differentiate different categories of controls on a form or as an introduction to a fairly long control description. 标题的最大长度为 99 个字符。The maximum length of a title is 99 characters. 如果此属性包含的字符串长度则 99 个字符，将不显示任何标题。If this property contains a string longer then 99 characters, no title will be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Internet Explorer 5 和 Microsoft Windows XP 引入了动态用户界面效果，例如窗口淡入淡出和动画。Internet Explorer 5 and Microsoft Windows XP introduced dynamic user interface effects such as window fading and animation. 如果用户未禁用这些功能，属性可以用于为工具提示显示在这些平台上启用此功能。If the user has not disabled these capabilities, the property can be used to enable this capability for ToolTips displayed on these platforms.
